statements: SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, order_date, recommendation FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 456 ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_status = 'Pending' AND customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders, MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 200
SELECT order_id, order_status, recommendation FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM OrderHistory WHERE status = 'shipped'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT product_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM OrderHistory WHERE status = 'delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_id IN (456, 789)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as unique_customers FROM Recommendations
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_status='Delivered';
SELECT * FROM OrderStatusLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM RecommendedProducts ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_status='Delivered';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT r.product_id, p.product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM RecommendedProducts r JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, l.status_description FROM OrderHistory o JOIN OrderStatusLogs l ON o.order_id = l.order_id WHERE o.order_status='Pending' ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM order_tracking ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM order_tracking WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM order_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, status FROM order_tracking WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM recommended_products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items ORDER BY order_id ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT r.recommendation_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name FROM recommendations r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY r.recommendation_id ASC;
